item.title: 19 Best Prime Day Outdoor Deals (October 2025)
item.description: Backcountry and Public Lands both have some great deals on WIRED-tested outdoor gear. Oh, and so does that place with all the Prime stuff.

item.title: A Surprise Deal on Fellow Aiden—WIRED's Favorite Coffee Maker
item.description: The best drip coffee machine in existence—the Fellow Aiden— is $80 off for Amazon Prime Big Deals Days.

item.title: Trumpworld's Least Favorite Cabinet Secretaries
item.description: “Worst, Bondi,” they begin. “2.) Bondi. 3.) Bondi. 4.) Bondi. 5.) HegsethRFKTulsiNoem.”

item.title: Google’s virtual try-on shopping tool expands to more countries, now lets you try on shoes
item.description: To virtually try on a pair of shoes, users need to tap on any product listing on Google, select the "try it on" button and then add a full length phot...

item.title: Squishmallows, Lego, and Other Toys Are 50% off Right Now
item.description: Get a head-start on holiday shopping for your kids (or yourself) thanks to these discounted toys.
